entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
